(:action cut_strips
  :parameters (?npc - npc ?elastic - elastic)
  :precondition (and (at ?npc ?loc) (at ?elastic ?loc) (shape ?elastic uncut))
  :effect (and (shape ?elastic cut) (location ?elastic in_lap) (length ?elastic shorter))

(:action cut ; Cut an item and update its state
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?loc) (at ?item ?loc) (shape ?item uncut))
  :effect (and (shape ?item cut) (location ?item in_lap) (length ?item shorter))

(:action slip ; Slip beads onto an elastic band
  :parameters (?npc - npc ?bead - bead ?elastic - elastic ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?npc ?loc) (at ?bead ?loc) (at ?elastic ?loc) (location ?bead off_strip))
  :effect (and (location ?bead on_strip) (organization ?bead in_order_on_band) (shape ?bead banded))

(:action finish ; Finish a task and update its status
  :parameters (?npc - npc ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?npc ?loc) (status ?item in_progress))
  :effect (and (status ?item completed))
